data.title: Oando Energy Services Company News
meta_keywords: oil and gas petroleum news events stories articles analysis commentary headlines stocks finance commodities maps pictures
data.meta_description: Recent news articles on Rigzone about Oando Energy Services
data.text:
Chevron Selling 40% Stakes in Two More Nigerian Oil Blocks

Chevron says it was selling its 40% stakes in two more Nigerian shallow water offshore oil blocks, Oil Mining Leases (OML) 86 and 88 in the Niger Delta area.

8:00 PM

Oando Deploys Rig for Shell's Niger Drilling

Oando Energy Services Limited has announced the deployment of one of its swamp rigs, OES Passion, to execute a two year drilling contract with Shell in the Niger Delta.

7:00 PM

Nigeria's New Leader Woos Oil Companies

Nigeria's new acting president, Goodluck Jonathan, is attempting to breathe life into the nation's ailing energy sector just two days after assuming the duties of President Umaru Yar'Adua.

7:00 PM

Oando, Gazprom Form Strategic Sub-Saharan Africa Partnership

Oando has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) with Russia's energy giant Gazprom to jointly develop projects in multiple sectors of Nigeria's oil and gas industry.

8:00 PM

Nigeria's Oando Records 4% Increase in Profits for First Half 2009

Oando has announced its profits for the six-month period ending June 30, 2009, representing a 4% increase over the same period in 2008.

8:00 PM

Oando Scores $150MM Agip Drilling Contract in Niger Delta

Oando has secured a $150 million two-year drilling contract with Nigerian Agip Oil Co for its oil fields in the Niger Delta swamps.

8:00 PM

Nigeria's Oando Grows Profits by 63%

Oando has announced unaudited results for the nine months ended September 30, 2008. The company reported a gross profit of $138.63 million, up 63% over the same period in 2007.

7:00 PM

Oando Signs PSC, GMoU on OPL 236

Oando Exploration and Production (OEPL), in line with its commitment to fast track the development of its upstream assets, in Uyo, Akwa Ibom, signed a Global Memorandum of Understanding with the Ukana South 1 communities, within block OPL 236.

8:00 PM

Oando, Shell and Agip Work Out Interest in OML 125 and 134 Offshore Nigeria

Agip has exercised its pre-emption right to the two oil blocks located in OML 125 and 134. Oando has in turn immediately expressed its willingness to work with Agip to explore collaborative opportunities and remain confident of a positive outcome.

8:00 PM

Dubai World Sets Up Venture For Foreign Oil, Gas Buys

Dubai-government funded investment company Dubai World has discreetly set up a venture for petroleum acquisitions abroad, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest Gulf company seeking new reserves beyond their oil-rich countries.

8:00 PM
